name: GamingOnLinux.com Dark 2014 (pdq)
description: Dark style for gamingonlinux.com domain and hide navbar.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
 @-moz-document domain(gamingonlinux.com){body {background-color: #202020 !important;} input, textarea, select {color: #FFFFFF;background-color: #202020;border-color: #37332B;-moz-appearance: none !important;} mark {color: #FFFFFF !important;} fieldset {border-top-color: #3F3F3F !important;border-right-color: #3F3F3F !important;border-bottom-color: #3F3F3F !important;border-left-color: #3F3F3F !important;} body {color: #CCCCCC !important;background-color: #202020 !important;} a {color: #357EBD !important;} a:hover, a:focus {color: #69A3D5 !important;} .img-thumbnail {background-color: #202020 !important;border-top-color: #222222 !important;border-right-color: #222222 !important;border-bottom-color: #222222 !important;border-left-color: #222222 !important;} hr {border-top-color: #111111 !important;} h1 small, h2 small, h3 small, h4 small, h5 small, h6 small, .h1 small, .h2 small, .h3 small, .h4 small, .h5 small, .h6 small, h1 .small, h2 .small, h3 .small, h4 .small, h5 !important;} a.text-primary:hover {color: #5697CF !important;} .text-success {color: #89C38A !important;} a.text-success:hover {color: #ABD4AC !important;} .text-info {color: #70AFCE !important;} a.text-info:hover {color: #96C4DB !important;} .text-warning {color: #C4A775 !important;} a.text-warning:hover {color: #D3BE99 !important;} .text-danger {color: #BD5856 !important;} a.text-danger:hover {color: #CB7C7B !important;} .bg-primary {color: #111111 !important;background-color: #357EBD !important;} a.bg-primary:hover {background-color: #5697CF !important;} .bg-success {background-color: #16270F !important;} a.bg-success:hover {background-color: #2B4C1D !important;} .bg-info {background-color: #081C26 !important;} a.bg-info:hover {background-color: #113B50 !important;} .bg-warning {background-color: #1C1803 !important;} a.bg-warning:hover {background-color: #4A3F08 !important;} .bg-danger {background-color: #210D0D !important;} a.bg-danger:hover
